title: Allotment of land shall be on lease for the period of 30 years, which shall be renewable for further period of 30 years at a time
clause_text: Allotment of land shall be on lease for the period of 30 years, which shall be renewable for further period of 30 years at a time. However, Allotment of rehabilitation tenements for owners and beneficiaries shall be on ownership basis. This provision of lease shall not apply for the authorised building constructed on private land.
section: Process of Allotment to Beneficiaries and Conditions thereof :-

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
